subject: Basketball (College)
Television
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: In the No. 1 CBS and Turner Sports booth for the N.C.A.A. tournament, Grant Hill sometimes seems timid beside the veteran announcer Bill Raftery.
snippet: In the No. 1 CBS and Turner Sports booth for the N.C.A.A. tournament, Grant Hill sometimes seems timid beside the veteran announcer Bill Raftery.
